GSD.description:
selinux: fix memleak in security_read_state_kernel()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit c877c5217145bda8fd95f506bf42f8d981afa57d. For more details please see the references link.
